channel.title: 508 bulby needing a level to use
channel.description:
hiya guys well i doing finals touches to my server and i am thinking of realsing but!!!! well i have designed this lil bit for a minigame but either i need to make it so u cnt climb the ladder unless u have 99 summoning or if u talk to the npc he will say "go away" if u dnt have 99 summoning.Can someone plz make me the code i will rep++ anyone who can get it done. right the
npc id = 2910 or object id (ladder) = 28572 Best Wishes :) White Merlin :)
